title: My league won't launch wtf
body: My league won't launch and every time I try to it says PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working please help me.

replies.body: The kernel error is usually a result of a security or software setting that's configured to block the patcher from launching.  Run through each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up.  I hope that helps!
